body.name: JUKMO Quick Release Tactical Belt, Military Work 1.5" Nylon Web Hiking Belt with Heavy Duty Seatbelt Buckle
features: ONE BUTTON QUICK RELEASE BUCKLE：The crafted heavy-duty buckle is made of zinc alloy. As long as you push the button on the buckle, the buckle would release instantly. It is super convenient to release your pants for doing whatever you want to do. You would never meet a belt so quick convenient like this. The designed buckle has very strong load-bearing capacity, which can meet your different wearing requirements

HIGH QULITY STRETCH NYLON：We intent to make the strap be stretch. The strap is made by special stretch material which is more solid than regular belt. More than that, it is very sturdy as well as stretch, which make your waist be more comfortable as well as stay tight, when you take large range of activities. Anyone who do physical activities for a long period of hours will get a great use out of the tactical belt
FOR SPECIAL YOU: Our solid belt suits for military, SWAT, fire fighters, work, sport and other tactical users. Anyone who need to take any activity will be in harmony with the belt
AS A PRESENT: Our elaborate belt is enclosed in an elegant gift box for you giving whoever you love, or yourself
SHOPPING GUARANTEE：If you meet any problems after purchasing the belt, please don't hesitate to contact us. We promise to provide you 100% satisfying guarantee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, comfortable belt with quick release seatbelt buckle.
reviews.reviewText: This is the first belt I have used with a seatbelt buckle. It’s awesome! It’s lightweight, sturdy, and built to last. Easy to remove, easy to adjust and looks sleek. It would perfect for making into a work belt with a little creativity. A person could make/attach various pouches, hooks, d-rings to the belt and make a custom work belt. I am tempted to do this for my work in freight to hold extra box cutters, blades, packing tape, band-aids, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OUT OF BOX - PUT ON PANTS - CLICK...WERE GOOD TO GO!
reviews.reviewText: This JUKMO quick release tactical belt is specialized merchandise of high quality.It securely holds my somewhat heavy items of tactical need while keeping my pants up with the reassuring click of the seat-belt type buckler. The belt is made of durable and extremely strong nylon.This belt is made to last. This belt resists the tests of time. If only the first one like it could talk, the tails would be many. Survival is not easy, not a game. These belts are proven tools of necessity and sucess.The belt fit as expected. It was on time and delivered securely and properly.If you are looking for a good service or tactical belt at a very reasonable price then this is the excellent value you have been seeking. In my opinion it is one of the best, if not the best, for your money.Five BIG Stars for this JUKMO tactical belt with very positive quick release feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good.. but..
reviews.reviewText: When you finally get it on it works great. But .. the belt has a 2 part buckle, which is ok, however the belt webbing itself has a removable loop which needs to be removed while putting the belt on the pants, then the removable loop goes on, or the loop will not fit through the pant loops…Then you need to separate the two part buckle, feed the belt webbing through the buckle, connect the buckle ends, and if it fits great, But.. if it doesn’t fit, unbuckle the buckle, adjust the webbing, and reattach the buckle. oy!Lets just say if a regular belt takes 10-15 seconds to put on this one takes 30 secondsHowever, once you get used to it, it’s actually a very good feeling belt. I’m wearing it as I write this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm a Sheriff’s Deputy, and I used this belt for a few transport shifts. Where all I needed was my gun holster and gun. The belt was stiffer and much sturdier then I realized. It held very well, despite having a little give. It is a little annoying taking it on and off, meaning you can't just slide it off like you could most belts. But if you don't mind that little caveat, then it's a very good belt, for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This belt is durable and comfortable. It’s easy to use and adjust. The buckle doesn’t easily fit through the loops on my jeans so I wouldn’t recommend wearing it through the TSA checkpoint in the airport because sometimes when I take it off, the elastic strap that ticks the tip of the belt gets caught in the loops or falls off. Other than that, I love this belt. It’s also great if you carry daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too stretchy for reliable carry
reviews.reviewText: My main reason for the 3 stars is that this belt is decent for normal wear but not for guns due to its stretchy nature. I understand having SOME stretch, but I could keep adjusting it all day and still have too much stretch to be too stretched to feel comfortable. The belt buckle is too big and bulky, which will cause discomfort if you don't have a flat stomach.At this price, rather than buying this, I would recommend just saving up a bit more and buying a KORE belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORKS LIKE IT SHOULD, RUNS ON THE LONG SIDE
reviews.reviewText: It's a great buckle for tightening or loosening on the fly without being locked into specific holes on a traditional belt. VERY good if camping or hunting and you happen to have gear/tool bags hanging from the belt and you have to tighten as you hike or work. The strap fabric also has a bit of give, so you're not pinched if you've tightened it while hiking and then go to sit down. This feels like essential outdoor gear to have, would definitely recommend.I bought this belt for my size waist and could easily cut a good 5" or 6" inches off the end, which I think I will do.As for the buckle not fitting through your belt loops, you have to be smarter than the belt. No other way to say it. Instructions are pretty clear -- run the belt strap itself through your pant loops with the buckle snapped shut on one end, like any standard belt. Insert the open strap end into the buckle and tighten it. From then on you can open and close the belt buckle with an easy touch of it's button. No need to take the strap out of the buckle until you put the belt into another pair of pants. It is no harder than a standard belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son and he likes it. Because of the material, he calls it his seatbelt belt. the latch works well, and is easy to open/close.

Comfortable belt, in fact I forget I even have it on. Easy to buckle and adjust, webbing is thickish and has some stretch for comfort. Buckle is strong and easy to use, no accidentally openings. It won't replace my other leather belts, but being infinitly adjustable is nice.As others (and the manufacturer) have said, the buckle is just a bit too big to pass though belt loops (even on jeans) so if you want to remove the belt to switch pants you have to unloop one end first. It's not a huge issue but be aware.Also because the nylon has some stretch for comfort I'd be a bit concerned about sag if you have something heavy on your belt. There are some other belts that use a non-stretchy material and I'd recommend those if you're clipping or holstering heavy tools to your belt.

Muy buen cinturón aunque lo pedí muy grande porque no confiaba en las medidas pero para la otra ya sé y pediré otro cintó más chico… creía que la hebilla sería muy ancha y me lastimaría con la barriga que tengo pues otros cintos me han causado heridas en el ombligo pero este su hebilla es chica y muy cómoda… yo compraría otro cintó pero más chico…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had a plastic webbing bely before and been disappointed by it - it kept slipping. However, this belt is excellent. It is comfortable to wear (a couple of long haul flights proved that), and once set in position has not slipped. The slight elasticity helps in both these regards. It looks like it is wearing well. You do need to watch that the little elastic loop is not lost when you are taking the belt off and on (airport security). Very pleased with this belt.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein weiterer Taktik-Gürtel mit etwas Stretch
reviews.reviewText: Positiv:- verfügbare Länge, sogar bis 155 cm- mehrere Farben und verschiedene Schließen- starkes Band, sogar etwas Stretch (das verbessert Vieles)- allgemeine Verarbeitung und Erscheinung sehr gutNegativ:- die Verpackung (tolle Schachtel + Säckchen) sind völlig unnötig - das nutzt nach dem Auspacken doch Keiner. Der Gürtel alleine ist toll genug. Diese extra Ausgabe könnte man sparen und dafür etwas den Preis senkenFazit:Ein starker Allrounder für Beruf und Freizeit zu einem fairen Preis, der besser mit Ihnen zusammen arbeitet als ein herkömmlicher in der Länge fester / statischer Gürtel wie z.B. bei Leder und flexibel genug, um nicht mit der Kante in den Körper zu drücken je nach Haltung. Die Machart löst viele Probleme anderer Gürtel, so daß die Zufriedenheit steigt.Kann ich uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen und würde ich so auch wieder kaufen.

Ottima cintura, rigida. Soprattutto questo tipo di chiusura è facile da agganciare e sganciare. Una volta sistemata con la misura giusta della propria vita, bisogna solo attaccare i due estremi della fibbia.
